decks.notes: This deck focuses on using fast mana sources like Chrome Mox and Lotus Petal to power out disruptive creatures like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Elite Spellbinder early in the game. It aims to control the board with cards like Chalice of the Void and Palace Jailer while applying pressure with creatures like Anointed Peacekeeper and White Plume Adventurer. The inclusion of Solitude provides additional removal options, giving the deck a versatile toolkit to deal with a variety of threats. Eiganjo, Seat of the Empire and Karakas provide protection for key creatures, allowing for a strong and resilient aggro strategy.

The main concept of this deck is to control and disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining card advantage. It utilizes a combination of counterspells (Force of Will), removal spells (Swords to Plowshares, Prismatic Ending), and card selection/draw spells (Ponder, Brainstorm, Expressive Iteration) to control the board and ensure the player has the necessary answers. The inclusion of Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes adds a unique win condition and utility to the deck. Additionally, the deck has access to powerful cards like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and Endurance to further control the board.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively play creatures like Delver of Secrets and Dragon's Rage Channeler while using countermagic and removal spells to control the game and protect our threats. By combining tempo plays with efficient creatures and disruption, this UR Aggro deck aims to quickly apply pressure to the opponent and maintain control of the game through card advantage and powerful spells. The inclusion of cards like Murktide Regent and Expressive Iteration adds additional card advantage and threats to the deck, making it a versatile and competitive choice for Legacy 1 vs 1 matches.

This deck focuses on quickly playing aggressive creatures like Delver of Secrets and Dragon's Rage Channeler while disrupting your opponent with cards like Daze and Force of Will. It utilizes cards like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat for removal and burn, and also has efficient card draw with cards like Ponder and Brainstorm. The deck aims to apply pressure on the opponent early while controlling the board with counterspells and removal spells, ultimately aiming to deal enough damage to win the game quickly.
